personalInfo.name: Javier Jaramillo
personalInfo.title: Data Analyst | Full Stack Developer | IT Specialist
personalInfo.tagline: Tech Innovator | Data Visualization Expert | Software Developer | Project Manager | Team Leader | Full Stack Engineer | Data Science Specialist | Agile Leader
personalInfo.summary: Experienced Data Analyst and Full Stack Developer with 15+ years of expertise in data visualization, automation, and software development. Proven track record of reducing processing time, improving efficiency, and delivering innovative solutions across education, healthcare, and technology sectors.

testimonials.name: Michelle McFarlane, PMP, CSM
testimonials.relationship: Worked with Javier at different companies
testimonials.quote: I worked with Javier at CityRealty for over 3 years. I've found him to be adaptable, supportive, and a great team member. He's an excellent problem solver and was always a go-to resource for technical issues. He was someone I always trusted and could count on for guidance. He's a motivated, intelligent, and a forward thinker. It was true pleasure working with him.

testimonials.name: Bonnie Clark
testimonials.position: Strategic Communications Professional & Writer for High-Profile Executives
testimonials.relationship: Worked with Javier on the same team
testimonials.quote: Though I didn't work with Javier for very long, he left a very positive impression on me. He not only ran the data, which I needed for reports and stories, he always talked through the findings to make sure I fully understood and was capturing the information in the most accurate light. Javier would also assist with brainstorming and was an all-around team player. I recommend Javier and believe that he would be a great asset to any company.

testimonials.name: Ondel Hylton
testimonials.position: Senior Director of Content and Research
testimonials.quote: Javier is a close friend and a bastion of data and computer knowledge that I've had the pleasure of working with (and from) for six years at CityRealty. We have collaborated on several projects inside and outside of the office, and his passion for his field that continuously leads him to investigate more efficient and smarter means of solving problems made him a central asset to our team. His expertise in data analysis and various computer languages made him an essential asset to our company and team. I am certain he will bring his intelligence, insight, and professionalism to all his endeavors.

testimonials.name: Diana Schnabel
testimonials.quote: I had the privilege of managing Javier as a CUNY intern for the NYC Department of Education. Javier is extremely hardworking and eager to learn new technologies. He is a great asset to any organization.

testimonials.name: James Beveridge
testimonials.position: Product Leadership | Business Analysis | Business Intelligence
testimonials.quote: Javier was a student in the Data Analytics course at General Assembly for which I was an instructor. Over 11 weeks I was exposed to his excellent analytical skills, especially with respect to VBA, Advanced Excel development and SQL. His curiosity, creativity and aptitude stood out throughout the course--for example, after an early assignment on basic address normalization he created a VBA module to automate and extend the work we had done, refining it over the course of the class. Javier is also a very amiable, personable guy, which is certainly not a given in this field! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him to any analytically-minded team.

testimonials.name: Rosario Altamirano
testimonials.quote: Javier es persona honorable confiable ejecutiva y respetuosa conoce bien de su formacion academica en programacion de sofware

testimonials.name: Jerry George
testimonials.relationship: Worked with Javier on different teams
testimonials.quote: I worked with Javier while he was with the Security Identity desk at the NYC Department of Education. Javier is a hardworking and dedicated individual who was a pleasure to interact with every day - he always followed through on issue resolutions and collaborated on process improvements. I am pleased to recommend Javier to any future prospective employer.

testimonials.name: Rev. Steve Lopez
testimonials.relationship: Worked with Javier on different teams
testimonials.quote: I have had the pleasure of working for many years with Javier. He is a responsible, bright, articulate and energetic person who can view issues from a global perspective. His analytic skills are an asset to any organization.

motivation.heading: Why I Built This Portfolio
motivation.text: This portfolio was created with love for my wife Cris, my daughter Sofia, and my son Mateo. It reflects my journey as a developer, educator, and lifelong learner. My experience spans data analytics, full-stack development, and educational technology, and I am passionate about building tools that empower others. Thank you to my family for their unwavering support and to all the mentors, colleagues, and students who have inspired me along the way.

motivation.heading: Por Qué Creé Este Portafolio
motivation.text: Este portafolio fue creado con amor para mi esposa Cris, mi hija Sofía y mi hijo Mateo. Refleja mi trayectoria como desarrollador, educador y aprendiz de por vida. Mi experiencia abarca análisis de datos, desarrollo full-stack y tecnología educativa, y me apasiona crear herramientas que empoderan a otros. Gracias a mi familia por su apoyo incondicional y a todos los mentores, colegas y estudiantes que me han inspirado en el camino.
